label: Ensure that Container Instance are integrated with Malware and Vulnerability Scanner tools
description: A thoroughly scanned image deployed in production is not guaranteed to be up-to-date for the lifetime of the application. Security vulnerabilities might be reported for layers of the image that were not previously known or were introduced after the production deployment. Container images deployed in production must be periodically audited to identify images that are out of date or have any malware running that might have exploited vulnerability or misconfiguration.
link: link to terrform line/comment where requirement is implemented
